body.ab: I had taken leave of all <lb n="c56-0021__main__4"/> my friends excepting Clerval, who spent <lb n="c56-0021__main__5"/> the last evening with us. He bitterly la<lb n="c56-0021__main__6"/>mented that he was <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4032"/>not able<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4032"/>unable to <lb n="c56-0021__main__7"/> accompany me But his father <lb n="c56-0021__main__8"/> could not <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4046"/>bear<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4046"/>be persuaded to part with him <lb learning <lb n="c56-0021__left_margin__6"/> was superflous <lb n="c56-0021__left_margin__7"/> in the com<lb n="c56-0021__left_margin__8"/>merce of ordi<lb n="c56-0021__left_margin__9"/>nary life.<lb xml:id="c56-0021.07"/>merchant.<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4190"/> Henry had a refined mind <lb n="c56-0021__main__14"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4198"/>and a<del was well pleased to become the <lb n="c56-0021__main__16"/> partner<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4219"/>of<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4219"/> his father's <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>partnerbut he believed <lb n="c56-0021__main__17"/> that a man might be a very good <lb n="c56-0021__main__18"/> trader and yet <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4241"/>have<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4241"/>posess a cultivated <lb n="c56-0021__main__19"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4252"/>mind.<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4252"/>understanding.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0021__main__20"/> We sate late listening to his com<lb n="c56-0021__main__21"/>plaints, and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4270"/>I<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4270"/> making many little <lb n="c56-0021__main__22"/> arrangements for the future. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4275"/>and<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4275"/><mdel>t</mdel>The <lb n="c56-0021__main__23"/> next morning early I departed. Tears <lb n="c56-0021__main__24"/> gushed from the eyes of Elizabeth <lb n="c56-0021__main__25"/> they proceeded partly from sorrow <lb n="c56-0021__main__26"/> at my departure, and partly because <lb n="c56-0021__main__27"/> she reflected that the same journey <lb n="c56-0021__main__28"/> was to have taken place three <lb n="c56-0021__main__29"/> months before when a mothers <lb n="c56-0021__main__30"/> blessing would have accompanied me
